episode_summary: This episode of Keeping It Real announces a live webinar event featuring top real estate experts sharing strategies on lead generation, video marketing, and business improvement. Listeners will gain insights from Greg Pekarski, a $220M producer, and learn video mastery from Kim Rettberg, along with coaching from Brett Scott to identify business opportunities.
